CLEO.0AA2:
int iTemp
if or
    load_dynamic_library "SilentPatchIII.asi" store_to iTemp
    load_dynamic_library "SilentPatchVC.asi" store_to iTemp
    load_dynamic_library "SilentPatchSA.asi" store_to iTemp
then
    print_help_formatted "SilentPatch is Active"
end
CLEO.0AB0:
while true
    wait 0

    if
        is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.F8
    then
        print_help_formatted {text} "~r~Key pressed!"

        
        // wait for key release
        while is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.F8
            wait 0
        end
        
        print_help_formatted {text} "~g~Key released!"
    end
end

imgui.2218:
if
    imgui_button {buttonName} "Press me!" {width} 0.0 {height} 0.0
then
    print_help_formatted {text} "Button was pressed!"
end

input.HOLD_KEY:
// emulates a single key press
Pad.HoldKey(KeyCode.W)
wait(0)
Pad.ReleaseKey(KeyCode.W)
input.RELEASE_KEY:
// emulates a single key press
Pad.HoldKey(KeyCode.W)
wait(0)
Pad.ReleaseKey(KeyCode.W)
